pr_title: Fix incorrect array length when sliced

timeline.bodyText: I think the array slice should be directly supported by ArrayValue. That way we can use java's system.ArrayCopy which is a native JVM implementation and probably be much faster. Shall we create an issue for that.
timeline.author: rdhananjaya

replies.bodyText:
Created an issue to track this.
#20632
replies.author: irshadnilam

timeline.bodyText: Can you add test cases for fixed-length arrays as well (if they aren't there)? Both positive and negative cases.
timeline.author: pubudu91

replies.bodyText:
Added test cases for fixed-length.
Currently (with this PR) the result of slice function on a  fixed-length arrays also returns a non-fixed array. Hence, there aren't any negative cases.
Once this ballerina-platform/ballerina-spec#391 (comment) is clarified, i'll make the necessary changes and add the negative test cases.
